title: [LFM] Volatile eSports Looking for Plat 3+ Members (All roles)
body:
Volatile eSports are a newly formed team that are looking for a brand new League of Legends roster.

We are currently in the process of branching out to other genres such as FPS (BattleField and CounterStrike).

Over the next few weeks we will be setting up our new TeamSpeak, Youtube channel and website.

We really want to get this team rolling ASAP and will be looking to compete in tournaments and LANS eventually. If you're not serious or dedicated please do NOT apply.
We are currently looking for

TOP :
JUNGLE :
MID :
ADC :
SUPPORT :

Captain (Shot caller and team leader) :

Currently the age limit is 17+ for tournament purposes

If you wish to apply please fill out the following
Example;

Age: 18
Location: Perth
Rank: Plat 2
Position: ADC
Champion Pool: Graves, Lucian, Vayne, Jinx, Tristana, Corki

Why you want to join: Looking to join a competitive team that won't fall apart after 1 week.

Do you have a working Mic?: Yes

Add me in game: Nestay

replies.body: Will you answer my question: Why are you setting out requirements so high that even you aren't anywhere close to it? (i.e You're gold with probably over 1k+ ranked games). Just seems extremely stupid and outrageous

> [{quoted}](name=Child,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=7xKk11AA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2014-12-27T08:36:26.639+0000)
>
> Will you answer my question: Why are you setting out requirements so high that even you aren't anywhere close to it? (i.e You're gold with probably over 1k+ ranked games). Just seems extremely stupid and outrageous

I'm not playing in the team. I'm an FPS player (BF4 and CSGO) but just happen to play league as well. We started it out as a FPS organization but decided to expand out to League of Legends. If I was playing in the team then yes it would be "outrageous". Hope that answers your question.

ok thanks for your reply, it's just there's many hosts of teams who ask for such outrageous requirements when they're not even the rank themselves. 
sorry for the misunderstanding & good luck with your teams/games

Age: 18
Location: NSW
Rank: Plat 5
Position: Support
Champion Pool: Janna, Morgana, Blitz, Leona, thresh, Annie
Why you want to join: Looking to find a team to play and train with.
Do you have a working Mic?: Yes

Age: 20
Location: Brisbane
Position: ADC
Champion Pool: Corki, Cait, Lucian, Kalista, Tristana (Will learn any adc that is required to work with team comp)
Why I want to join: I've always dreamed of competing in a ranked 5's team and I want a team that won't jsut give up after they start to lose, a team where communication is essential.

I have a working mic, got teamspeak curse voice and skype.

IGN: CobbDog22

> [{quoted}](name=CobbDog22,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=7xKk11AA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-26T07:48:36.223+0000)
>
> Age: 20
> Location: Brisbane
> Position: ADC
> Champion Pool: Corki, Cait, Lucian, Kalista, Tristana (Will learn any adc that is required to work with team comp)
> Why I want to join: I've always dreamed of competing in a ranked 5's team and I want a team that won't jsut give up after they start to lose, a team where communication is essential.
> 
> I have a working mic, got teamspeak curse voice and skype.

Hi mate thanks for taking the time to fill out an application, I'm just letting you know anyone lower than the minimum required rank of Plat 3 will be taken into consideration but will need to undertake extensive trials/Practise.
Okay, well at the moment I'm plat5, if you want me to go through a trail that's fine.
Plat 4 now might be plat 3 by the time you come back to check haha

Age: 20
Location: Sunshine Coast (Queensland).
Rank: Plat 5.
Position: Jungle.
Champion Pool: Jarvan, Elise, Lee Sin, Vi, Wukong.

Why you want to join: Most of the time I play it's just casual with friends (Whom are floating between bronze and silver). I'm searching for some drive and competition within league, I seldom do ranked, but next season I have my sights set on diamond. I watch too many streams for my own good, and consider myself extremely knowledgeable on the game and am very confident on shot calling. I'm more than confident doing trials to show that I'm above plat 5.

Do you have a working Mic?: Yes.
Thanks for the application, after a week or so I'll get in touch with everyone that has applied and start working on trials/rosters etc.
Anytime! I hope to hear back from you soon :)

Age: 19
Location: Sydney
Rank: Plat 5
Position: Mid
Champion Pool: Syndra, Twisted Fate, Ahri, Leblanc, Lux, Orianna
IGN: Eastwood
Mic: Yes
Why: Holidays, Bored.

Age: 21
Location: Gold Coast
Rank: Plat 2
Position: Support
Champion Pool: Janna, Nami, Thresh, Leona, Braum, Blitz, Morg, Alistar, Lulu, Annie, Zyra.

Why you want to join: Looking to play seriously with other people that have the same intention.

Do you have a working Mic?: Yes
Bump

Age: 17
Location: Vic
Rank: Plat 2
Position: MID
Champion Pool: Xerath,Velkoz,Syndra,Jayce,Zed

Why you want to join: Been playing this game for a while now am im looking for a serious/active team to progress to a high level

Do you have a working Mic?: Yes

Add me in game: fegit

Age: 21
Location: Sydney
Rank: Diamond 4
Position: Support
Champion Pool: Morgana, thresh, nami, janna, braum, sona, zilean, fiddle, etc..

Why you want to join: Looking for a team which will go at LEAST into diamond and hopefully start to go competitive as well. Also of course, looking for a team of dedicated players who play well with each other which doesnt fall apart after a short amount of time..

Do you have a working Mic?: Yes

IGN: Defqons

> [{quoted}](name=Defqons,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=7xKk11AA,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2014-12-28T16:19:48.826+0000)

> IGN: Defqons

Added.
Still looking for a Top and Mid
Add me in game: Nestay
I've added you all, will invite you to the practise team.

Age :16 (17 in May)
Location : Auckland
Rank: p3
Position Adc/Sup ( Also have a wide Jungle Pool)
Champ pool : What ever is needed.
I have a working mic.

Age: 23
Location: Regional NSW
Rank: Plat 1
Position: jungle
Champ pool: Vi main, kha, j4, wukong, panth. Can pick up others.
Why I want to join: just want to see if I have what it takes to compete seriously at league on Oce. 

So work full time hours so would need to see how many hours and time slots team is looking at.
Just a quick update, the team is being renamed to Savage eSports. Final changes have been made to CyberGamer and team names.
